creditline: Gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
dimension: 29 x 20 in. (73.66 x 50.8 cm) (sheet, as printed)
text: This artwork is part of the series COVID-19: Labor Camp Report. Artist's statement on this artwork originally published on the @laborcamp Instagram account: It doesn’t matter whether the border wall was demolished by wind yesterday or a few weeks ago, in New Mexico or in Texas. The lesson remains the same: in the eyes of nature, we are all indivisible. She will always show us the way.
title: July 28, 2020: INDIVISIBLE
